title: New: Lapalux – Gutter Glitter
body:
With the release of his [**Brainfeeder**](http://www.brainfeedersite.com/) debut _**When You’re Gone**_ just round the corner, British producer [**Lapalux**](http://www.facebook.com/Lapaluxmusic) has dropped the psychedelic _Gutter Glitter_, a cut set to feature on the seven track release. Pitch-shifted vocals and inebriated synths spiral mercilessly out of control, making for a fantastically bewitching listen. Check out _Gutter Glitter_ below, and check out _**When You’re Gone**_ when it’s released on 7 February.

Via [Pitchfork](http://pitchfork.com/reviews/tracks/12987-gutter-glitter/).

 [Lapalux – Gutter Glitter](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad/lapalux-gutter-glitter) by [crackintheroad](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad)
